body:
Comment 2: 
It yields two errors only for string and raw string literals where T can be of any type.

two errors:

  []T{""}
  []T{``} 

one error:

  []T{string("")}
  []T{string(``)}
  []T{true}
  []T{complex128(1)}
  []T{true}
  []T{string(0x266c)}
  []T{float32(0.49999999)}
  []T{0.49999)}
